name: Sanjit Biswas
content:
Sanjit Biswas is co-founder of Meraki, Inc. He, Hans Robertson, and John Bicket started the company based on their work on Roofnet project [1] at MIT.
 Biswas has a bachelor's degree from Stanford and a master's degree from MIT.
 In 2007, he was named to the MIT Technology Review TR35 as one of the top 35 innovators in the world under the age of 35.[2]
raw:
Sanjit Biswas is co-founder of Meraki, Inc. He, Hans Robertson, and John Bicket started the company based on their work on Roofnet project [1] at MIT.
Biswas has a bachelor's degree from Stanford and a master's degree from MIT.
In 2007, he was named to the MIT Technology Review TR35 as one of the top 35 innovators in the world under the age of 35.[2]

References[edit]


^ Ph.D research Archived August 31, 2006, at the Wayback Machine

^ "2007 Young Innovators Under 35". Technology Review. 2007. Retrieved August 15, 2011.
